Translations.Text: Kuma ka ba su labari cewa ruwa rababbe ne a tsakaninsu (da raƙumar), kowane sha, mai shi yana halartar sa
Sai suka kira abokinsu, sai ya karɓa, sa'an nan ya soke ta
To, yaya azabaTa take da gargaɗiNa
Lalle Mu, Mun aika tsawa guda a kansu, sai suka kasance kamar yayin mai shinge
Kuma lalle ne, haƙiƙa, Mun sauƙaƙe Alƙur'ani, domin tunawa. To, shin, akwai mai tunawa
Mutanen Luɗu sun ƙaryata, game da gargaɗi
Lalle Mun aika iskar tsakuwa a kansu, face mabiyan Luɗu, Mun tsirar da su a lokacin asuba
Saboda wata ni'ima ta daga gare Mu. Kamar haka Muke saka wa wanda ya gode
Kuma lalle, haƙiƙa, ya yi musu gargaɗin damƙarMu, sai suka yi musu game da gargaɗin
Kuma lalle haƙiƙa, su, sun neme shi ta wajen baƙinsa, sai Muka shafe idanunsu. "To, ku ɗanɗani azabaTa da gargaɗiNa
Kuma lalle, haƙiƙa, wata azaba matabbaciya ta waye musu gari da yaƙi, tun da safe
To, ku ɗanɗani azabaTa da gargaɗiNa
Kuma lalle ne, haƙiƙa, Mun sauƙaƙe Alƙur, ani domin tunawa. To, shin, akwai mai tunawa
Kuma lalle, haƙiƙa, gargaɗin ya je wa mabiyan Fir'auna
Sun ƙaryata game da ayoyinMu, dukansu sai Muka kama su, irin kamun Mabuwayi, Mai ikon yi
Shin, kafiranku ne mafi alheri daga waɗancan, ko kuwa kuna da wata bara'a a cikin littattafai
Ko za su ce: "Mu duka masu haɗa ƙarfi ne domin cin nasara
Za a karya taron, kuma su juya baya domin gudu
A'a, Sa'a ita ce lokacin wa'adinsu, kuma Sa'ar ta fi tsananin masifa, kuma ta fiɗaci
Lalle ne, masu laifi suna a cikin ɓata da hauka
Ranar da za a ja su a cikin wuta a kan fuskokinsu. "Ku ɗanɗani shafar wutar Saƙar
Lalle Mu, kowane irin abu Mun halitta shi a kan tsari
